name: Empyrean Frontier
description:
Empyrean Frontier is a Real Time Strategy game about an epic interstellar conflict, featuring massive space fleets, base building, and resource collection. Conquer the galaxy in a procedurally generated campaign or match wits against the cunning AI in a variety of skirmish game modes.Features
  • Procedurally Generated Campaign
  • 2 Skirmish Game Modes
  • 2 unique factions
  • Base Building
  • Intuitive Tactical Controls
  • Superweapons
